revised_title: A Review of Meteorological Observations from 1731 to 1735
tldr: This article presents a summary of meteorological observations recorded between 1731 and 1735, including data on barometers, thermometers, and rainfall from various locations. The author, Geo. Hadley, discusses the methods and contents of the diaries, as well as the instruments used for observation. The data can be used for further analysis and comparison of weather patterns and climate trends.
